text: The House of the Dead () is a 1932 Soviet drama movie directed by Vasili Fyodorov.Правнука Достоевского не трогают даже гаишники! The movie is based on the novel of the same name by Fyodor Dostoevsky. It stars Nikolay Khmelyov, Nikolai Podgorny, and Nikolai Vitovtov. == Actors == * Nikolay Khmelyov as Fyodor Dostoyevsky * Nikolai Podgorny as K.P. Pobedonstzev * Nikolai Vitovtov as Tsar Nikolai I * Nikolai Radin as L.V. Doubelt * Vladimir Belokurov as Stammering Announcer == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1932 drama movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies set in the 19th century
title: The House of the Dead (1932 movie)
